fieldDescription: Adds the Pascal system on world generation. Will apply to existing saves if the system has not yet been generated.
Gives Graveyard Station to the Nightcross Armory faction on sector generation. Only applies when the Pascal System is being generated, otherwise requires a new game.
Removes Nightcross Armory gear from random drops and loot in exploration content. Secret content is unaffected.
Removes just gear with the "Nightcross Restricted" design type from salvage. Has no effect unless "remove gear from caches" is true.
Remove the merc tag from Nightcross Armory equipment, so mercenaries won't use them.
Enables the Nightcross Tactical Display, an experimental fleet status display during combat.
Shows the Nightcross Tactical Display only when paused.
Shows the Nightcross Tactical Display even when UI is turned off (via F11 key by default)
Makes the Nightcross Tactical Display smaller.
Uses blue instead of green for ship sprites.
Distance of Nightcross Tactical Display from top of screen.
Distance of Nightcross Tactical Display from left edge of screen.
Does not display flux bars and PPT/CR time for ships.
Does not display assignment info text (e.g. 'S&D' 'retreat') next to ships. Note: Does not remove controls, thats a separate option.
Removes the ability to click on the Nightcross Tactical Display, making it purely informational.
Removes the 'Nightcross Tactical Display' label. Note: This voids the warranty.
Enables encounters in the abyss. Applies to existing saves.
Adds mysterious wandering fleets to the sector. Will apply to existing saves if they haven't been generated yet. Requires a new game to remove (for now).
Adds exploration content for salvage and profit. Requires a new game.
Adds a few rare Nightcross ships as derelicts in the sector.
